caption.p: (A) An optical micrograph of CdSe QDs in chloroform and CdSe-micelles in water prepared using cetyl trimethylammonium bromide.

(B) UV-vis spectra of (1) CdSe/CdS in hexane, (2) CdSe/CdS QD-micelles prepared using 1,2-dioctanoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphocholine (C8-lipid) and hexadecylamine, and (3) 1,2-distearoyl-sn-glycero-3-phosphoethanolamine-N-amino (polyethylene glycol) and dipalmitoyl phosphatidylcholine.
(C) Transmission electron microscopic image of CdSe/CdS QD-micelles.
(D) PL of CdSe/CdS in toluene (solid line) and C8-lipid-encapsulated CdSe/CdS QD-micelles in water (dashed line).
